mainMVC.model.game

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainMVC.model.game.Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    a team object represents a team in the game. each team has a score that is updated every 5 second each team has a name each team has the total number of humans. If player tries to move more human than they have, it will move the total number of humans each team has the most 3 cities.
    Author:
    Bojun
